dcterms:description: The Radio Environment Map (REM) provides spectrum occupancy data, including geo-location, carrier frequencies, and transmission power levels, supporting cognitive functions in satellite communication systems.
dcterms:title: Radio Environment Map (REM)

dcterms:description: LEO satellite orbital elements provide essential parameters for understanding the dynamics and positioning of low Earth orbit satellites, which are crucial for interference mitigation strategies.
dcterms:title: LEO satellite orbital elements

dcterms:creator: B. Al Homssi

dcterms:description: Interference sources include both intentional and unintentional disruptors affecting satellite communication systems, which are critical for evaluating performance in LEO constellations.
dcterms:title: Interference sources

dcterms:creator: H. Pirayesh
H. Zeng
dcterms:description: Jamming methods encompass various strategies employed to disrupt satellite communications, which are essential for understanding and developing effective countermeasures.
dcterms:title: Jamming methods

dcterms:creator: G. Marti
T. KÃ¶lle
C. Studer
dcterms:description: Smart jammers are advanced interference sources that adapt their strategies to disrupt communications, necessitating sophisticated mitigation techniques in satellite systems.
dcterms:title: Smart jammers

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
D. W. K. Ng
W. H. Gerstacker
H.-H. Chen
dcterms:description: Multiple-antenna techniques are employed to enhance physical layer security and improve communication performance in satellite systems, particularly in the context of interference mitigation.
dcterms:title: Multiple-antenna techniques

dcterms:creator: J. Zhang
M. Lin
J. Ouyang
W.-P. Zhu
T. De Cola
dcterms:description: Robust beamforming techniques are designed to enhance security in multibeam satellite systems, addressing challenges posed by interference.
dcterms:title: Robust beamforming

dcterms:creator: Z. Lin
M. Lin
J. Ouyang
W.-P. Zhu
A. D. Panagopoulos
M.-S. Alouini
dcterms:description: Secure beamforming strategies are developed for multibeam satellite communication systems to enhance security against potential threats.
dcterms:title: Secure beamforming

dcterms:creator: Z. Lin
M. Lin
B. Champagne
W.-P. Zhu
N. Al-Dhahir
dcterms:description: Cognitive satellite terrestrial networks leverage secure beamforming techniques to protect against unknown eavesdroppers, enhancing overall communication security.
dcterms:title: Cognitive satellite terrestrial networks

dcterms:creator: A. Al-Hourani
dcterms:description: The dataset provides a tractable approach for predicting pass duration in dense satellite networks, which is crucial for understanding satellite visibility and communication opportunities.
dcterms:title: Pass duration in dense satellite networks

dcterms:creator: I. S. Mohamad Hashim
A. Al-Hourani
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on satellite-based localization of IoT devices using joint Doppler and angle-of-arrival estimation, which is essential for enhancing communication in IoT applications.
dcterms:title: Satellite-based localization of IoT devices
